data.lyric:
[ti:2 Much]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]2 Much - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:00.38]Lyrics by：Josh Gudwin/Justin Bieber/Gregory Eric Hein/Freddy Wexler/Gian Stone/Alexander Izquierdo/Sonny Moore/Martin Luther King Jr.
[00:00.76]Composed by：Josh Gudwin/Justin Bieber/Gregory Eric Hein/Freddy Wexler/Gian Stone/Alexander Izquierdo/Sonny Moore/Martin Luther King Jr.
[00:01.15]Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere
[00:05.84]
[00:16.17]Maybe I stare too much
[00:17.58]
[00:18.14]Maybe not long enough
[00:20.09]Funny how I forget to blink
[00:21.95]
[00:23.67]But when you let down your hair
[00:25.49]
[00:26.18]Dancin' like no one's there
[00:27.93]I know I'm where I'm s'posed to be
[00:29.86]
[00:31.83]Say I love you under my breath
[00:34.00]More times than you can digest
[00:35.93]It's music every time I hear your name
[00:38.11]
[00:39.93]Your head's layin' right on my chest
[00:41.92]Sun's up and I still ain't got no rest
[00:44.17]
[00:45.26]Don't wanna close my eyes
[00:46.32]I'm scared I'll miss too much
[00:48.44]
[00:49.32]Don't wanna fall asleep I'd rather fall in love
[00:52.46]
[00:53.40]When I can't feel you I feel out of touch
[00:56.55]
[00:57.64]Two seconds without you's like two months
[01:00.53]
[01:01.27]Don't wanna close my eyes
[01:02.29]I'm scared I'll miss too much
[01:04.47]
[01:05.12]Don't wanna fall asleep
[01:06.29]I'd rather fall in love
[01:08.37]
[01:09.35]'Cause eternity with you ain't long enough
[01:12.46]
[01:13.60]Two seconds without you's like two months
[01:16.49]
[01:17.04]And that's too much
[01:18.56]
[01:19.70]I love the way you love your mom
[01:21.73]And take on all your friends problems
[01:23.98]And still somehow stop the world for us
[01:26.00]
[01:27.97]I still relive the second
[01:29.98]I met my biggest blessing
[01:31.93]Prayed for you look what God has done
[01:34.10]
[01:35.63]Say I love you under my breath
[01:38.13]More times than you could digest
[01:40.04]Music every time I hear your name
[01:43.85]Your head's layin' right on my chest
[01:45.97]Sun's up and I still ain't got no rest
[01:48.19]
[01:49.29]Don't wanna close my eyes
[01:50.41]I'm scared I'll miss too much
[01:52.51]
[01:53.29]Don't wanna fall asleep
[01:54.40]I'd rather fall in love
[01:56.48]
[01:57.45]When I can't feel you I feel out of touch
[02:00.55]
[02:01.67]Two seconds without you's like two months
[02:04.51]
[02:05.31]Don't wanna close my eyes
[02:06.28]I'm scared I'll miss too much
[02:08.44]
[02:09.18]Don't wanna fall asleep
[02:10.27]I'd rather fall in love
[02:12.38]
[02:13.36]'Cause eternity with you ain't long enough
[02:16.41]
[02:17.66]Two seconds without you's like two months
[02:20.48]
[02:21.07]And that's too much
data.trans:
[ti:2 Much]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.76]//
[00:01.15]任何一处的不公 都会威胁全世界的正义
[00:05.84]
[00:16.17]或许我盯了太久
[00:17.58]
[00:18.14]又或许我看的还不够
[00:20.09]真是有趣 你怎让我目不转睛
[00:21.95]
[00:23.67]当你散开秀发 
[00:25.49]
[00:26.18]翩翩起舞 仿佛全世界只剩下你我
[00:27.93]我明白这里就是我命中注定的归宿
[00:29.86]
[00:31.83]低声呢喃着那句我爱你
[00:34.00]重复千遍万遍 让你无法招架
[00:35.93]每一次听见你的姓名 都似有优美旋律响起
[00:38.11]
[00:39.93]你的头枕在我的胸口
[00:41.92]太阳已经升起 但我仍然没有休息
[00:44.17]
[00:45.26]我不想闭上眼睛
[00:46.32]害怕错过太多的惊喜
[00:48.44]
[00:49.32]我不愿进入梦乡 更想沉沦在这爱河里
[00:52.46]
[00:53.40]当我感觉不到你 我好像跟世界断开了联系
[00:56.55]
[00:57.64]没有你陪伴的时间 我度日如年
[01:00.53]
[01:01.27]我不想闭上眼睛
[01:02.29]害怕错过太多的惊喜
[01:04.47]
[01:05.12]我不愿进入梦乡
[01:06.29]更想沉沦在这爱河里
[01:08.37]
[01:09.35]因为就算永远和你在一起 我也无法满足
[01:12.46]
[01:13.60]没有你陪伴的时候 我度日如年
[01:16.49]
[01:17.04]难以忍受
[01:18.56]
[01:19.70]我爱你孝敬母亲
[01:21.73]爱你会帮朋友分担所有难题
[01:23.98]仍然不知怎的 世界会为我们停止转动
[01:26.00]
[01:27.97]我还是会沉浸到那一秒钟
[01:29.98]我得到了上天最好的祝福
[01:31.93]为你祈祷 看看上帝都做了什么
[01:34.10]
[01:35.63]低声呢喃着那句我爱你
[01:38.13]重复千遍万遍 让你招架不住
[01:40.04]每一次听见你的姓名 都似有优美旋律响起
[01:43.85]你的头枕在我的胸口
[01:45.97]太阳已经升起 但我仍然没有休息
[01:48.19]
[01:49.29]我不想闭上眼睛
[01:50.41]害怕错过太多的惊喜
[01:52.51]
[01:53.29]我不愿进入梦乡
[01:54.40]更想沉沦在这爱河里
[01:56.48]
[01:57.45]当我感觉不到你 我好像跟世界断开了联系
[02:00.55]
[02:01.67]没有你陪伴的时间 我度日如年
[02:04.51]
[02:05.31]我不想闭上眼睛
[02:06.28]害怕错过太多的惊喜
[02:08.44]
[02:09.18]我不愿进入梦乡
[02:10.27]更想沉沦在这爱河里
[02:12.38]
[02:13.36]因为就算永远和你在一起 我也无法满足
[02:16.41]
[02:17.66]没有你陪伴的时候 我度日如年
[02:20.48]
[02:21.07]难以忍受
